name: Recycle (itch) (GreatJaggi)
description:
Recycle !

Entry for Extra Credits Game Jam #3

Theme: Cycle

Goal: Get as many items as you can before you run out of energy!

Controls

  • WASD - Directional Movement
  • Q - Scan for batteries!
  • RMB - Dash
  • Space - Jump (Has some bug ~ Gravity Bug) 

Notes: The game is still in development I will change this notice ones this is completed. Feel free to try the game and let me know if there are any problems.

Thank you! Enjoy!
